attributes.action: Petition to stop the reward of the failure by the ex speaker with a Lordship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM keeps going on about not rewarding those in the private sector, particularly banking for failure, yet continues to reward failed politicians, Kinnock, Mandelson and now the idiot ex speaker

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
